message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $10,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,000. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I understand your offer, but $6,000 is too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $9,000.  This product is truly worth it, and I'm confident you'll see the value in it.
I'm still not convinced that the product is worth $9,000. I'd be willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $7,000. Can you meet me there?
